1377960.name: SuperMash Soundtrack
1377960.description:
The latest soundtrack from industry vet David J. Franco, best known for his work on the Drawn to Life, Lock's Quest and Scribblenauts soundtracks. SuperMash is a game that makes games, and the tracks reflect the zany and wild combinations that are possible, as well as provide an homage to the 8 and 16 bit classics of the 80's and 90's.

  • Includes over 100 tracks from the game, with 2+ hours of original music!
  • New Tracks from the upcoming Brawler and Top Down Shooter Genres
  • Listen to 6 unreleased tracks, from early in development and cancelled genres!
